townSquare.text: You are in the town square. You see a waterwell, a store, a tavern called The Mossy Mug and a path leading to the forest.

store.text: You enter the store. The shopkeeper, an old lady, greets you warmly. There are some health potions on the counter and weapons hanging on the wall.

tavern.text: You enter the tavern. The smell of ale and something that vaguely resembles stew fills the air. You see a few townsfolk enjoying their drinks and a stern looking man behind the bar.

forest.text: You are in a dense forest. The trees are tall and the air is filled with the sounds of wildlife. You notice the entrance to a cave, a path to a clearing in the trees, and a mountain in the distance.

cave.text: You enter the cave. You see some creatures: a rather gelatinous looking...gloop? - and a giant bat. They look rather friendly.

clearingEmpty.text: The middle of the grassy clearing is filled with sunshine and flowers. Birds are chirping and butterflies are flying to and fro.  There is nothing here, except for a nice little place to sit and rest.

clearingGame.text: The middle of the grassy clearing is filled with sunshine and flowers. Birds are chirping and butterflies are flying to and fro. You see a rather shady looking fellow, sitting next to his old ramshackle cart. He beckons you closer and invites you to play a game with him.

mountain.text: You climb the mountain and reach the top. Clouds are rolling by. You see a dragon and a bowl of ... stew? The dragon looks rather intelligent, amplified by it's dark green scales and golden yellow belly. The dragon looks at you with a mix of curiosity and something you can't quite place.
